  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.kzoo.grid.display.GridDisplay, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class SimpleMBSDisplay
extends edu.kzoo.grid.gui.GridAppFrame
    Grid-Based Marine Biology Simulation Program:
    A SimpleMBSDisplay is a simple graphical user interface for the Marine Biology Simulation. The user interface consists of a window containing the environment display (objects in a grid), with a slider for speeding up or slowing down the simulation.
    Version:
    25 April 2019
    Author:
    Alyce Brady
    See Also:
